name: Fog Factory - Game Maker
description:
If you've always wanted to create your dream story or level and show it to others, now's your chance.
Create and share your creativity with others.
Fight in the levels of others.
Solve environmental puzzles.
Conduct an investigation.
Slow down and talk.
Fight against steampunk and fantasy bosses .
Use steampunk devices.
Explore fantasy dungeons.

Or as a creator in game maker
Create your own level or quest
Place your opponents
Set up items
Visual Script Code
Dungeon world - Many Characters - Maze, Arena, Quests and Adventure in dungeons

Test yourself in the Labyrinth
- looking for an exit portal
- escaping from deadly fog (remember here about runes)
- fighting on the arena or participating in adventures.
If you have only moment check Fast Quests.
